metadata.title: CVE-2023-29469 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libxml2 before 2.10.4. When hashing empty dictstrings in a crafted XML document, xmlDictComputeFastKey in dict.c canproduce non-deterministic values, leading to various logic and memoryerrors, such as a double free. This behavior occurs because there is anattempt to use the first byte of an empty string, and any value is possible(not solely the '\0' value).

criterions.comment: libxml2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
